vote.title: Authorize acquisition, including the exercise of the right of eminent domain, if such becomes necessary, from Charter DMN Holdings, LP, of approximately 36,228 square feet of land located near the intersection of Young and Houston Streets for the Kay Bailey Hutchison Convention Center Dallas Master Plan Component 1 Convention Center Expansion Project - Not to exceed $6,553,040.00 ($6,521,040.00, plus closing costs and title expenses not to exceed $32,000.00) - Financing: Convention Center Construction Fund
vote.description: Authorize acquisition, including the exercise of the right of eminent domain, if such becomes necessary, from Charter DMN Holdings, LP, of approximately 36,228 square feet of land located near the intersection of Young and Houston Streets for the Kay Bailey Hutchison Convention Center Dallas Master Plan Component 1 Convention Center Expansion Project - Not to exceed $6,553,040.00 ($6,521,040.00, plus closing costs and title expenses not to exceed $32,000.00) - Financing: Convention Center Construction Fund
